location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Elphinstone, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of ten bales of printed cotton at Bushire, delivered by HMS Lion. It notes that some bales got wet during unloading and have become, to a degree, damaged goods and will be taken by Sir Gore Ouseley to be given away as small presents.
